entry.title: WIND WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: E 78 km/h gust 93 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Blowing snow. Wind east 80 km/h gusting to 110. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 90 km/h gusting to 120 diminishing to 70 gusting to 100 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
